page.title: 08Rishton Railway Station
page.content: More people use the trains in the morning than in the afternoon. It takes 5 minutes from Rishton to Blackburn or to Accrington. Trains arrive in Rishton at 45 minute intervals. The first train arrives in Rishton at 07.37 and the last train arrives at 23.34. The train to Blackburn is on the opposite side from the entrance and the train to Accrington is nearer the entrance. The local fares are quite cheap, sometimes cheaper than the bus fares. The station is not manned, the passengers have to buy their tickets from the conductor on the train.
